translations.chinese: 六年冬十月，令天下縣邑城。
translations.english: In the tenth month of winter in the sixth year, he commanded all counties and towns in the world to build walls.

translations.chinese: 人告楚王信謀反，上問左右，左右爭欲擊之。
translations.english: Someone informed that King Chu Han Xin was plotting rebellion. The emperor asked his attendants. The attendants all wished to attack him.
Using Chen Ping's plan, he pretended to tour Yunmeng.

translations.chinese: 十二月，會諸侯于陳，楚王信迎謁，因執之。
translations.english: In the twelfth month, he assembled the feudal lords at Chen. King Chu Xin came to greet him, and he arrested him.
